DOC.detailed_description: The aim study evaluate efficacy , safety impact quality life relate oral health tooth whiten technique young individual . It randomize , parallel single blind . Participants divide three group ( n = 30 ) accord bleach technique perform ( G1 = Office / hydrogen peroxide 6 % ; G2 = Office / hydrogen peroxide 15 % ; G3 = Home / carbamide peroxide 10 % ) . The color teeth evaluate seven different time , use color scale Vita Master Classic 3D spectrophotometer Vita Easy Shade Advance . IGM ( 1986 ) - presence tooth sensitivity visual analogue scale gingival security modify gingival index evaluate . The impact bleach quality life assess use Brazilian version oral impact daily performance ( OIDP ) . The instrument apply interview form two different time baseline ( T0 ) thirty day first evaluation ( T4 ) . Statistical analysis include descriptive analysis test compare two bleach technique color change , sensitivity , gum irritation impact quality life .
